modName: Marriage Dynamic Outfits - Spouse Redress and Hugging features
summary:
Have you ever wonder why your partner wear the same clothes all the time (if not a follower)?

Well, this mod let your spouse relax and wear different outfits every day.
The plugin let you to show a set of clothing (topic "Let me dress you up", up to 100 items!), so your spouse could wear this items the way he/she want
descriptionHtml:
[center][url=http://www.skyrimgems.com][img]http://i.imgur.com/sSbds.png[/img][/url][/center]

[color=red][size=7]Marriage Dynamic Outfits is back! Now with divorce tracking![/size][/color]
[color=white][size=7]Compatible with Hearthfire![/size][/color]
[color=yellow][size=7]Works without SKSE![/size][/color]

Plugin is no longer supported. Verson 1.7 will be the last. Thanks everybody for the feedback! Please, make sure you have read the FAQ before asking questions.

[b]Please, watch trailer[/b]
[youtube]IPj93TXC4uM[/youtube]

Description:
Have you ever wonder why your partner wear the same clothes all the time (if not a follower)?

Well, this mod let your spouse relax and wear different outfits every day.

The plugin let you to show a set of clothing (topic "Let me dress you up", up to 1500 items in total!), so your spouse could wear this items the way he/she wants.

Once you define a set, the outfit will be changed randomly every time you enter the area or when spouse changes activity. Your partner will prefere more expensive clothes (random factor is still stronger than the price).

You can redefine the set at any time.

Please, read FAQ at the bottom of the description section.

[b]Plugin is updated to version 1.7[/b]

Added divorce tracking. Now you can divorce without having to make a clean save.

1) Divorce any way you like (via console or via plugin). Make sure you have performed the divorce correctly. There are a lot of plugins that leaves garbage from the old marriage.
2) Ask Mara for forgiveness. To do that you can meet your old spouse or pray at the shrine of Mara.
3) Now you can redress your new spouse!

[b]Plugin is updated to version 1.6[/b]
(if you face unexpected issues caused by migrating from old version, [b]clean save is strongly recommended[/b])

Hugging will no longer kill player (please provide detailed feedback if it still doesn't work in your case)

Smelting activity is attached to smithing.
Baking activity (Hearthfire) is attached to cooking

[b]Plugin is updated to version 1.5[/b]

Hugging will no longer kill your spouse if you are a vampire, but he/she will be silent untill you leave current cell (better silent than dead, I think)

Enchanting and alchemy activity are now united, old "alchemy" activity is replaced with woodwork and smithing

Delayed body equipping, solved problem with hooded robes and head clothing conflicts (spouse was forced to unequip hooded clothing when helmet is equipped )

Provided description in dialogues

You can now disable hugging and stealth equipping with "Habits" option

Added "lack of must-have items" warnings to single items dialogue that will explain player why spouse won't wear given outfit (very popular question :) ). Note: spouse will mix this clothes with partial sets, even in case of lack of must-have items.

More complex random (more uniform distribution) - influences not only by native Skyrim random routine (which is really BAD). Uses such independent factors as spouse position in space, current time, distance to player, etc

Fixed sleeping outfit bug (player was unable to set single items for sleeping in versions 1.3 and 1.4)


[b]Plugin is UPDATED to 1.4[/b]

Sometimes (very rarely) hugging animation can work like a killmove. I haven't reproduce such issue by myself, but i've got several reports from users. In new version killmove safety restrictions were implemented for hugging scene. Here is how it works:
[youtube]DUfFOpZeBAs[/youtube]

[b]Plugin is UPDATED to 1.3[/b]

Added Hearthfire compability. Now it is using independent utility quest, so it will also be compatible with most other marriage mods. But still no multimarriage.

Clothes changing routine is assigned to preferences, so you will have less chances to face nude spouse. For example, if you force your partner to wear boots via preferences ("About single outfit parts..." option), he/she won't change clothes if there are no boots for target activity. Works only with single items, so you still can define a set or partial set with no boots.

[b]Plugin is UPDATED to 1.2[/b]

Added fitting options.

[b]Different clothes for different activity.[/b] You can define clothes for sleeping, enchanting, cooking, alchemy, combat and regular tasks.

[b]Full sets.[/b] Spouse can wear multiple items together exactly the way you define them. Set can be any length and can contain any clothes.

[b]Partial sets.[/b] You can define sets that will be mixed with single items every time.

You can define up to [b]1500[/b] items in total!

[b]Conflict management.[/b] If you define two pairs of gloves within one set - there will be a conflict. The second pair will be automatically associated with a group of single clothes.

Garbage collection is adopted to set. If some set contain a removed item, it will be [b]automatically destroyed[/b]. Items that left will be associated with a group of single clothes.

Following scheme shows connections between Full Sets, Partial Sets and single clothes. You can define shared clothes, which can be used in multiple sets. Just take clothes from spouse's inventory and place it back.
[img]http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/images/23099-1-1349686262.png[/img]

[b]Stealth equipping.[/b] Redressing routine in Skyrim has nothing to do with aesthetics. So I've desided that in most cases spouse should redress in stealth way (when player doesn't see him or her). Exceptions: sleeping or combat activities.

Now player can [b]force[/b] spouse to wear specific outfit part. Spouse will no longer stay barefoot, if you don't want!

[b]Make a compliment[/b] to automatically create a full set from equipped items (does not work with sets :) ).

If you want your spouse as a follower, you can use[b] "Prepare for combat"[/b] option before "Follow me". Spouse will also equip combat sets when he/she faces a danger.

[b]Plugin is UPDATED to 1.1[/b]
1) You can now bring default outfit back! Works only with native Skyrim spouses (topic "You old outfit suits you better").
2) You can set up to 100 items of clothing (required a clean save for this feature)!
3) Added several animations, fixed emotions in dialogs.
4) Your spouse will welcome you with hugs once a day! (it was easier and safer to implement this feauture within this plugin)
5) You can now create a set of clothing step-by-step (by adding new clothes to current set). It will be stable and won't reset every time. Garbage collection script will automatically remove obsolete references. However, you can remove all preferences by nude topic ("I prefer you to stay nude next time")
6) Improved keyword-based equipping algorithm.

[b]IMPORTANT NOTES![/b]

1) This mod is NOT compatible with any marriage overhaul that allow polygamy

2) This plugin OVERWRITES the default spouse's outfit. If you remove the plugin your spouse will be nude all the time. However, if you want to uninstall, just tell you partner "Take this money and buy some clothes" or "You old outfit suits you better". Then you can safely uninstall this mod, spouse will continue to wear target outfit.

There are several side mods that are used to make video and screenshots:
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/2676/
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/8042
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/19568

[color=yellow][size=7]FAQ[/size][/color]

[color=red][b]How to make this work?[/b][/color]

First, follow the instructions from welcoming message (save and load the game).

If you see the "dress up" topic, you can specify clothes for activities. Please, note that COMMON and SLEEPING activities are main priority. Spouse will use the COMMON/SLEEPING clothes when you enter your home (even if he/she is in process of making some potions). So, I recommend to setup them first.

All other activities are optional.

If you install the plugin BEFORE marriage, it may be nessesery to pray at the Shrine of Mara after the wedding ceremony to get the dressing topic(works only with version 1.7)

Also, there will be no "dress up" topic while your spouse is following you. You have to dismiss your partner to see dressing options.

[color=red][b]How to perform a clean save?[/b][/color]

You have two files named "marriagedynamicoutfits" in "SteamsteamappscommonskyrimData". You have to remove both of them. Remove esp, bsa to another folder -> Exit your home -> Save the game -> Restore esp, bsa -> Enable the plugin.

You don't need to restart all the game from Helgen!

[color=red][b]Why spouse wouldn't dress up aproppriate while following me?[/b][/color]

This mod doesn't control followers or follower redressing behaviour. However you can use "Prepare for combat!" option before "Follow me".

[color=red][b]Spouse is always nude / spouse stays nude when I enter the house[/b][/color]

Maybe there aren't enough clothes for specific activity to meet your preferences. By default, she can walk without hat or shield (since v 1.5 she can also walk without gloves). So, you can define a full set or give single items that meet preferences (including robe, gloves and boots) or you can also change preferences. For example, tell her that gloves are not necessary.
Clothes for cooking or other activities are independent from common clothes. Price is the factor within one activity.

Try fitting options to see what outfits are available. Also [b]"Prepare for combat!"[/b] option can be used to force spouse to equip combat clothes (single clothes, full sets and mixed sets). It can be useful to understand mod's mechanic without having to change location every time.

If it doesn't help, try to use "Forget everything" option or make a clean save.

[color=red][b]I don't understand the role of each option[/b][/color]

[b]"Take this'[/b] - she will wear this things randomly. It's just a heap of clothing (for common activity- name it [b]HeapCommon[/b], for example)

[b]"Take this and mix this with somethings else"[/b] - It's partial set. If you define common partial set, it will be mixed with [b]HeapCommon[/b]

If you define both, sometimes she will wear clothes from [b]HeapCommon[/b] randomly, and sometimes - [b]mix[/b] partial set with HeapCommon.

If you want stable sets, which will not be mixed with anything, define them via [b]"Take this clothes and wear them together"[/b]

You can define all 3 options for same activity, your partner will randomly choose between them.

[color=red][b]Is this mod compatible with follower mods?[/b][/color]

This mod does not affect followers behaviour in any way. So it should be compatible with most of the follower mods. However, there can be problems with plugins that force followers to redress. If you are playing with UFO, please do not apply it's redressing options to your spouse.

[color=red][b]Is this mod compatible with other marriage mods?[/b][/color]

Yes, if you don't use multimarriage option.

[color=red][b]Multimarriage issue[/b][/color]

Plugin is designed to track one person. Papyrus has it's limits, so I haven't found any flexible way to work with multiple NPCs. It all depends on how this multimarriage option is implemented.

[color=red][b]Can hugging feature conflict with other hugging mods?[/b][/color]

This mod allows you to give a hug to your partner in automatic way. Hugging uses native Skyrim animation. there shall be no conflicts.

[color=red][b]Game crashes[/b][/color]

All routines were written in very secure way, so I believe that game can crash mostly because of external factors.

Game can crash if you have installed some custom dress, gave it to wife and then removed new mod. Spouse will try to wear uninstalled dress, so there is a possibility of game crashes. Try to properly uninstall the clothing mod. You can also disable "Dynamic Outftis" and make a clean save.

Game can also crash if data structures become corrupted when migrating to a new version. Clean save should cure this problem.

If you experience crashing even after clean save when spouse inventory is open, AVOID SCROLLING! Gently remove all items from spouse inventory from the top without scrolling the list down. Close the inventory. After that you can give items as usual. This bug can be caused by some custom clothing mods, I have nothing to do with it.

[color=red][b]Can the game crash, if i remove some clothes from her inventory? What happens to set if some item was removed?[/b][/color]

There are garbage collection routines. They check which clothing was removed (you can use [b]ANY[/b] possible way to remove clothing, even pickpocket them), and they remove this items from preferences. The goal of garbage collection is to restore empty space, so you can give your spouse more clothes. But even if garbage routine is failed (which never happend before), nothing bad can happen, because there is a second check on equipping routine.

As I already wrote in description, if you remove item from common set, the last clothes will be associated with HeapCommon

[color=red][b]Can I loose my favorite gear because of bugs?[/b][/color]

Plugin does not use dirty "hidden container" tricks, actually it does not work with contrainers at all. Items goes directly to spouse inventory, so you will never loose your gear. There are additional safety checks, so your items also won't be duplicated because of... well... let's say "interesting" implementation of Skyrim's "EquipItem" routine.

[color=red][b]I have Hearthfire installed and there is no moving to another house options[/b][/color]

If you still have no store, cooking or moving to another house options, these effects may be results of version 1.2, so you have to make a clean save.

[color=red][b]How to perform hugging?[/b][/color]

Hugging works with dynamic outfits only, so you have to give clothes to your spouse. There will be no hugs and outfit won't change while your spouse persist as a follower. There also will be no hugs if the spouse use static (standart) outfit.

[color=red][b]I can't enter the dialogue with the spouse after hugging[/b][/color]

Maybe this is because you are a vampire. In the earlier versions spouse became dead in such case. Leaving and entering the house will cure such problems. You can disable hugging from dialogue, if it bothers you.

[color=red][b]Does this plugin work with every spouse?[/b][/color]

It works with all spouses in the game, it also should work with custom made spouses. Works with husbands and wifes.

[color=red][b]Why my spouse doesn't undress underwear?[/b][/color]

This mod does not affect underwear (it is part of character, not clothing). However, you can install naked version of CBBE, for example. Then your spouse will be completely naked

[color=red][b]How to uninstall? / I gave my wife money and told her to buy some clothes, but she wears only one outfit constantly[/b][/color]

"Buy some clothes" and "Old outfit" options define [b]static[/b] (native Skyrim's) outfits. This options can be useful in case of uninstalling the mod. Spouse will wear selected outfit constantly even if you remove this plugin.

[color=red][b]I can't restore old outfit[/b][/color]

Maybe you have married the non-default spouse, there is no way to restore old outfit for actors that were added by external plugins. Use "Take this money and buy some clothes" instead.

[color=red][b]What you did to marriage ceremony, weapons, spells, enchantments, ets?[/b][/color]

Sorry, but this mod does not affect marriage ceremony, weapon damage, followers or enchantments. You can try to disable plugins one by one in order to find a cause.

[color=red][b]Does this mod require script extenders or some other plugins?[/b][/color]

This mod [b]DOES NOT[/b] require SKSE or any external plugin to work properly. Please, make sure you have the last version of the game however.

[color=red][b]Spouse refuses to equip custom clothes. Does this mod support all slots?[/b][/color]

Plugin tracks keywords, not slots. Slots doesn't matter at all. Custom clothes should have proper keywords (the same as native Skyrim clothes).

Usual items (like robes, boots or hats) [color=red][b]SHOULD HAVE[/b][/color] such keywords as ClothingBody, ClothingHead, ClothingHands, etc...

Unusuall items (like tails, ears or masks) [color=red][b]SHOULD NOT HAVE[/b][/color] keywords that represent bodyparts. You can define it as Jewelry (ring or amulet, but [b]NOT[/b] circlet) if you have forge crafting problems.

You can edit clothing plugin by yourself (via CreationKit) or contact the author.

[color=red][b]Why spouse won't use weapons that I specified for target activity?[/b][/color]

Plugin doesn't track weapons by design.

[color=red][b]I can't see any divorce option[/b][/color]

Plugin doesn't provide divorce routine, it just tracks the effects of other divorce mods. You still have to use the external divorce plugin.

[color=red][b]Where can I find that nice looking armor from your video?[/b][/color]

Body and armor replacer (BE CAREFUL, it has some restrictions and incompatibilities):
http://modgames.net/load/256-1-0-11011

English translations can be found here:
http://blackelf-skyrim-en.blogspot.ru/

I strongly recommend to make backup of the "Data" folder or make BSA archive manually to easy uninstall in the future!

Mods are originally designed to fit the Lady Body (I haven't test them without the replacer):
http://modgames.net/load/306-1-0-13554
http://modgames.net/load/276-1-0-12736
http://modgames.net/load/306-1-0-12584
http://modgames.net/load/306-1-0-13015

There are no English versions. Use Google Translate to read descriptions.
All credits goes to Kris†a™.

You can find chests with these clothes at the Windhelm's dock
